CANCEL_SELECTION: Do you like to cancel the selection?
CARD_RANDOMIZE: Would you like to randomize the card order?
CARDSET_PREVIEW_MSG: Press  to use and  to cancel.
ENTER_CARD_DELAY: Enter the Card Delay. 70 is default.
ENTER_PAIR_AMOUNT: Enter the pair amount. Available Pairs: %i.
ENTER_WINS: Enter the amount of needed wins. 3 is default.
EXIT_GAME: Would you like to exit the game?
GAME_LOGIC:
The logic of this game is really simple.
You and your opponent try to draw 2 cards each round. 
If the card matches, you will receive a 'pair' and you can do your next turn.
If not, it is the next player's turn.
The player with the most pairs wins a game.
LOADING_SET_PROMPT:
Would you like to load this set?

%s
PLAY_AGAINST_AI: Do you like to play against an AI?
PLAY_BETTER_AI:
Do you like to use the better AI?
No would remember the last 2 cards.
Yes would remember all played cards.
PLAY_WITH_DELAY: Do you like to play with a delay?
REFRESH: Press Start to Refresh the Cardset list.
UI_COLOR_BEHAVIOUR:
Press START to Select.
 to cancel.
Touch to control the RGB.
D-Pad to control the RGB.
X_DEFAULT_SET: Press  to load the default set.
X_GAME_CHECK: Press  to execute the play check.
